text: IKIMfm (formerly IKIM.fm and Radio IKIM) is a radio station in Malaysia. It is run by the Institute of Islamic Understanding Malaysia (IKIM). IKIMfm was the first Islamic radio station in Malaysia to broadcast 24 hours a day. It was officially launched by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad on 6 July 2001. == Other websites == * * * * Category:Radio stations
title: IKIMfm
